content: I have and love the phisical game, but the app is far from being right. Multiples flaws on the scoring and the game play. Considering the app market, this app should be free.
I dont know.. I couldnt get beyond the enter your name page? It's probably me.
replyContent: Hallo Emily, it could be possible that you tried it at a very bad moment (wrong app version or our server had a temporary malfunction). Normally everything works fine if you are connected to the internet when registering a new account (name). Please let me know (alex@brettspielwelt.de) if the problems still exist.

content: Game has stopped working entirely so it seems. On multiple devices, when you launch the game you just get the grey background. Fix please.
This game is great! It's a very good implementation of the physical game. The only draw back is the rule book. I wish there was a walk through instead of just have the text to read through.

the app crashes almost every time halfway during a game. update august 11 2019: still crashing... Sep 4: updated the app on my tablet. Unfortunately, it still crashes halfway through the game. Update July 2020: app worked fine for some months, now it's back to crashing halfway through a game.
Great digital version of the game.

The game itself is fantastic. This app implementation has a long way to go.. A few things: Pressing the back button immediately exits you to home and you lose any game progress. You cannot save your progress at all to continue playing later on. Triggering some bonuses don't apply not allowing to fill in extra fields. At this point the game is basically broken. I do hope the developers fix these and other issues as I'd really like to enjoy this app.

The game is amazing, but once I am in the game I can neither change any settings nor restart the game or go back. Additionally, an undo button would be nice, as touch screens do sometimes register the touch on a neighbouring field, which is sad and combined with the lacks stated before, a little annoying. I would largely appreciate a change!
Min to learn Fun to try to master
I love this game. However, the achievemnts don't unlock half the time. I can see my score is over 400 in the stats but the over 350 achievement didn't unlock. It's a big problem.
I love this game! It's easy to learn, and fun to play.
Twice as much to deal with, and half as much time. The original is far better.
Great game. Learned on the board game first
No matter what I try, the app stays offline, so playing alone gets boring pretty quick.

Worthy sequel, this dice and match game will keep you playing forever. Choices are both harder than the first game due to the added possibilities, and easier due to more ways to get best score or near that.
A very different puzzle from the original. A great roll and write game!

The game is a great little time waster. The instructions could be a little clearer, and occasionally the app fails to load the game (hanging on a gray screen), but when it works it's very fun and more than a little addictive.
Great game, flawed app. Often does not record the score of a game in the stats. Frustrating. Otherwise great
Good but glitchy. I've noticed bonuses are not always applied, otherwise a good game

The game is great, but the app is far from great. I have to start it like 10 times before the game actually appears on my screen(when I hit "play" the screen just freezes, so I have to exit the game and start it again). At that point I almost don't want to play it anymore.
Edit: issue was resolved quickly - great app!
replyContent: Sorry this was a bug of the Chrome runtime M79 from Google. ( https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/56eb64f502ca1fa3e376a5234f384f5115e4f043 ) please contact us via email (alex@brettspielwelt.de) and we will recover your account manually.

content: You don't seem to be able to use any stats etc if you're offline. And you can't get online, BC it demands a username and then won't let you register it. I can't even find a website to register either the username or email. Bizarre and infuriating.
The app seems poorly optimized. It runs very slowly on my device. In addition there are some issues with translation. The game is an absolute pleasure though.

So addicting. I'm always trying to get at least 300 but it's hard. Only managed it once so far (319). What kinds of scores do you guys get and how? Please share. Anyways, the game is great... Suoer easy to learn but hard to master. We got it during the half price sale on Black Friday. Sweet!
Amazing, fun, totally replayable!!
Great game, played the hell out of Gon Schon Clever before this and Doppelt so clever is even better!
Unable to log in with an account Update: Account worked, able to use account on That's So Clever and Twice As Clever.
replyContent:
Hi,
did you try to make a new account or to use your account from the "pretty clever app"?

content: Why does it know accept to be transferred to the external storage (SD card)?
I would give this a full 5 stars because I really enjoy the game. But everytime I play it skips applying the bonuses from the pink row

The game itself is excellent, but I'm giving the app only two stars because it almost always resets when I switch apps in the middle of a game, sometimes even if I only go to the home screen. It's not my settings because other apps that I've set up to keep running in the background are working as expected. Once this is fixed, I'll change my rating.

Love the game. Quick to play. Challenging to get the new high score. A by-chance game with strategic score placement. It would be neat to have a second to fourth user, so the phone could be passed around.
Zero instruction on how to play.
replyContent: Just look at the rules section. It is linked on the  main screen.

content: can't log in or register, and I'm giving up on playing now that crashes are becoming a regular thing. Total waste of money.
replyContent: We just released a new version that fixes all known problems.

content: Gid its hard! To get ovwr 200 anyway. But I love it.

Awesome roll & write game! My only issue is with the login system. It's really clunky and difficult to use, which makes online gaming nearly impossible with emailing the dev for help. If they can fix that, it would be perfect.
Just as good as the original and even more of a challenge. It won't recognize my email from the previous game. Get that fixed and I'll update to 5 stars .
Quick, fun game to play!!

Ok game but the pink and green row bonuses dont always trigger. I set up a chain of bonuses and didn't get the first bonus in the chain. Needs looking at to find out why these bonuses don't trigger because I really enjoyed the first game app.
If you like the board game, this is a reasonable port. No explanation of the rules if you haven't already played the board game. No local multiplayer, which would have been really nice.
A good solo game with multiple variables that make it unique everytime you play it

Very good board game and the app basically works (solo mode). We never know when final scores will be recorded or omitted. It is hit or miss in that regard. Slight disappoint they don't support Google Play achievements also. There are other top-notch board apps that do.
does not work
bought the game at dice tower con and had to have the app too
excellent copy of the boardgame new challenge mode is worth the cash
very good app! would be great with Google play authentication for achievements!!!
Great Game...
replyContent: We fixed the problems with the login and the email registration. Sorry for the inconveniences.

content: This is a 5 star game shoved into a 3 star app. The two things preventing this game from receiving the final two stars are as follows. 1. I cannot for the life of me exit offline play in any way. Creating a new account doesn't work nor does using my email account that is linked to Ganz Schon Clever. it's very frustrating to have no way to keep track of scores. 2. this game (and ganz schon) need aome kind of multiplayer. Even a pass and play would be such a welcome addition to the game.
replyContent:
We fixed the problems with the login and the email registration. Sorry for the inconveniences.
You can play online at m.brettspielwelt.de against other people.

content: Harder than ganz schön clever I find this more challenging than the original. After many plays, I still don't have a strategy that consistently works. I enjoy trying though.
No instructions on how to use app. When I enter a name and click accept privacy all it says is "register account online" with no instructions on how.
replyContent:
We fixed the problems with the login and the email registration. Sorry for the inconveniences.

content: I can't log in either. I set up an acvount on schon clever, but it just says "check email" on this app.

content: No bugs or freezes. Easy to learn
Great game. Lots of replay value

Really enjoy this game. Fun little puzzle dice chucker. Of note a couple of the achievements don't seem to be working: I've scored over 350 and in the top 100 for past few weeks without the achievement showing up...
complex and so much fun!
Fun game. The app only logs my scores half the time. Really annoying when you get a good score and it just disappears without a trace. Pixel 2 XL
replyContent:
Hi Nathan ,

as  far as I know nothing gets lost, which is of course most important, but you are right that an immidiate update in any case would also be nice. Sometimes you just need to reopen it or wait a little bit to see your result in the list.

content: refunded this game because I was unable to connect online using the same username is that used for clever part 1. in fact it's user name I chose continue to tell me that it was already in use. I figured this app we're just add itself to your clever part 1 since they are picture together on the load screen of part 1. but both games appear to be separate and require individual accounts with individual screen names to operate. I wish they would change this to sign up under your Google Play account
replyContent:
Man kann die Apps verbinden und mit dem selben Account nutzen. DAfür muss man eine Emailadresse in der ersten App angeben und sich mit dieser in der zweiten App anmelden. So nutzt man dann einen Namen in beiden Apps.
Hier wird der Ablauf detailliert erklärt: http://clever.brettspielwelt.de/i

content: No score at the end, just 2dots like this .. Not always, but frequently, especially for scores above 200. Waiting for fix but will ask for refund if cant reach the developer.
replyContent:

I have never experienced this. Have you looked into your stats? There you can see your last 10 games.
It sounds like the font size is too big on your device, but so far we could not reproduce anything like that.

content: great game - much more difficult than ganz schon clever bit well worth puzzling out.
Very fun follow up game. These apps scream for multiplayer though!
fun and even more brain racking than Ganz! Wife and I love. For everyone saying it is not giving bonuses, double check the rules. We didn't see the read the rule for the pink row correctly at first.
Game is very cool, but can't login, so only have access to the offline play, which does not have the achievements...
bugged- pink row does add ? bonuses
replyContent:
Hi Mark,
Please double-check the rules regarding the pink row. You are always allowed to place there but won't get the bonuses if you do not fulfill the conditions. Hope you can then reconsider your rating

content: I just love it, I am nearly addicted :-), sitting hours on it to improve my achievements.
I get all the scoring but the silver section. Interesting game, quite distinct from the original.
Really great game, but no matter what i do i can't connect online.
